titles.title: America's Teachers Tax Relief Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend and increase the deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/14/2009--Introduced. America's Teachers Tax Relief Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the tax deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers and extend such deduction through 2010.
